Remove high background expression genes from matrix

Source: R/utils.R
remove_background.Rd

Remove high background expression genes from matrix

remove_background(mat, background, n = 0)

Arguments

mat

expression matrix
background

vector or dataframe or matrix of high expression genes in background
n

the number of top genes to exclude, 0 defaults to all

Value

expression matrix with rows removed

Examples

avg1 <- average_clusters_filter(
  mat = pbmc_matrix_small,
  metadata = pbmc_meta,
  filter_on = "nFeature_RNA"
)

mat <- remove_background(pbmc_matrix_small, avg1, 1)
mat[1:3, 1:3]
#> 3 x 3 sparse Matrix of class "dgCMatrix"
#>        AAACATACAACCAC AAACATTGAGCTAC AAACATTGATCAGC
#> PPBP         .              .              .       
#> LYZ          1.635873       1.962726       1.995416
#> S100A9       .              .              .
